comments.author: melissashapiro1@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 573368
picture of the missing UI

This only happened once on Nov 6 but Gavin said it was worth filing even if it wasn't reproducible.  

I use many app tabs.  Typically 8-10 at a time.  I'm in Aurora on a Mac.  The UI went a bit haywire.  You can see in the attachment.  The favicon for Zimbra is cut in half, I'm missing the left overflow button and there are weird extra pixels around where the overflow button should be.  

Funky but has only happened once and everything went back to normal after I quit and restarted Aurora.
